attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People with breathing difficulties who have to attend hospital regularly as inpatient/outpatient are subjected to smoke, making their current chronic situation worse or even life threatening. The smoke, in some cases, results in readmission as patient leaves hospital! Smoking shelters are not working. A total ban on smoking on NHS sites is the only answer. Please help these vulnerable and disabled people, many thanks.
